00005 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(read_line, 0){
00006   char* prompt;
00007   DFSCH_STRING_ARG_OPT(args, prompt, "> ");
00008   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00009   
00010   return dfsch_make_string_cstr(dfsch_console_read_line(prompt));
00011 }
00012 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(read_object, 0){
00013   char* prompt;
00014   DFSCH_STRING_ARG_OPT(args, prompt, "> ");
00015   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00016   
00017   return dfsch_console_read_object(prompt);
00018 }

00020 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_module_console_register(dfsch_object_t* env){
00021   dfsch_provide(env, "console");
00022 
00023   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "console:read-line", DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(read_line));
00024   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "console:read-object", DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(read_object));
00025   return env;
